summary: Light color scheme (white background, Visual Studio and Python colors)
name: Blueshift
description:
I use this color scheme when I want a clean and bright coding environment.
It's inspired by:
  - Visual Studio colors
  - pyte color scheme vimscript #1492.

Screenshot:

http://zwiener.org/pics/blueshift.png
install_details:
Just copy blueshift.vim to your vim colors directory and activate it with:

colorscheme blueshift
